text.div:
FHIR_pqcmc

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://hl7.org/fhir/us/pq-cmc/ImplementationGuide/hl7.fhir.us.pq-cmc

guide to submitting PQ/CMC data for exchanged in FHIR resources.

name: FHIR_pqcmc
title: PQ/CMC FHIR Implementation Guide
publisher: HL7 International - Biomedical Research and Regulatory WG

contact.name: HL7 International - Biomedical Research and Regulatory WG

description: guide to submitting PQ/CMC data for exchanged in FHIR resources.

resource.name: Base64DocumentReference
resource.description: A profile that represents the document or diagram in base64.

resource.name: Batch Analysis
resource.description: Batch or lot release testing  to ensure that pharmaceutical products meet the product specification.

resource.name: Batch Formula
resource.description: Listing of all components of the dosage form to be used in the manufacture, their amounts on a per batch basis, including overages, and reference to their quality standards.

resource.name: Batch Formula Ingredient
resource.description: Identifies the ingredients for the batch formula.

resource.name: CMC eCTD 32P32 Document
resource.description: Definition for a document bundle with the CMC eCTD 32P32 profiles.

resource.name: CMC eCTD 32S10 Document
resource.description: Definition for a document bundle with the CMC eCTD 32S10 profiles.

resource.name: CMC eCTD 32p10 Document
resource.description: Definition for a document bundle with the CMC eCTD 32p10 profiles.

resource.name: Component Substance
resource.description: Any raw material intended for use in the manufacture of a drug substance, or any ingredient intended for use in the manufacture of a drug product including those that may not appear in such drug product.

resource.name: Drug Product
resource.description: Includes the properties of the drug product, its components and impurities

resource.name: Drug Product Manufactured Instance
resource.description: Includes the properties of the drug product as manufactured.

resource.name: Drug Product Component
resource.description: The amount details about the drug product components to define the product composition in a product unit. Use composition.

resource.name: Drug Product Container Closure
resource.description: Description and coding of the container closure system. Profile of Drug Product profile.

resource.name: Drug Product Description
resource.description: Includes the properties of the drug product and components. Profile of Drug Product profile.

resource.name: Drug Product Ingredient
resource.description: The amount details about the drug product ingredients in the batch. Use for Batch Formula.

resource.name: Drug Product Impurities
resource.description: List of drug product impurities. Profile of Drug Product profile.

resource.name: Drug Substance
resource.description: Drug Substance (Active Ingredient) nomenclature and characterization.

resource.name: Drug Substance Manufactured Batch
resource.description: Includes the properties of the drug substance as manufactured.

resource.name: Substance Impurities
resource.description: Drug Substance Impurities. Profile on Drug Substance profile.

resource.name: Substance Raw Materials
resource.description: Drug Substance Raw Materials.  Profile on Drug Substance profile.

resource.name: Substance Nomenclature
resource.description: Drug Substance (Active Ingredient) nomenclature. Profile on Drug Substance profile.

resource.name: Drug Substance Structures
resource.description: Drug Substance (Active Ingredient) Representational Structures.  Profile on Drug Substance profile.

resource.name: Drug Substance Molecular Structure
resource.description: Drug Substance (Active Ingredient) molecular structure. Profile on Drug Substance profile.

resource.name: eCTD Product Description and Composition
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Product Description, Container Closure and Composition of the Drug Product to be included in the 3.2.P.1.0 folder of the eCTD. References Sponsor Organization, Drug Product Description, and Product Container Closure System.

resource.name: eCTD Batch Formula
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Product Batch Formula to be included in the eCTD.   References Sponsor Organization and Batch Formula

resource.name: eCTD Product Characterization of Impurities Composition
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Product Characterization of Impurities in a to be included in the eCTD.   References Sponsor Organization and Product Characterization of Impurities

resource.name: eCTD Product Container Closure System Composition
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Product Container Closure Systems to be included in the eCTD p.7.0

resource.name: eCTD Substance General Information
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Substance Nomenclature and Structure to be included in the 3.2.S.1.0 folder of the eCTD. References Sponsor Organization.

resource.name: eCTD Substance Control of Materials Composition
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Substance Control of Materials in a to be included in the eCTD. References Sponsor Organization and Drug Substance Materials.

resource.name: eCTD Substance Characterization
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Substance Structure and Impurities to be included in the 3.2.S.3.0 folder of the eCTD. References Sponsor Organization, Drug Substance Structure, and Drug Substance Impurities

resource.name: eCTD Substance Container Closure System Composition
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Substance Container Closure Systems to be included in the eCTD 3.2.S.6.0 eCTD folder. References Sponsor Organization and Substance Container Closure

resource.name: eCTD Specification Composition
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Quality Specifications to be included in the eCTD 3.2.P.5.1, 3.2.S.4.1, and 3.2.P.4.1 folders.. References Sponsor Organization and Quality Specification.

resource.name: eCTD Batch Analyses Composition
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Batch Analyses to be included in the 3.2.P.5.4 and 3.2.S.4.4 eCTD folders.  References Sponsor Organization and Batch Analysis

resource.name: eCTD Stability Data Composition
resource.description: The fields needed to represent the Stability Data to be included in the 3.2.P.8.3 , 3.2.S.7.3 and 3.2.P.4.5 eCTD folders. References Sponsor Organization and Stability Study.

resource.name: Excipient Drug Substance
resource.description: Provides sufficient information to identify an inactive substance and its source when stability data is required in the submission.

resource.name: Drug Substance Impurity
resource.description: Any component of the drug substance that is not the chemical entity.

resource.name: MfgTestSiteOrganization
resource.description: A profile for the data elements required to identify an organization that manufactures, processes or tests drug products or substances.

resource.name: Result Observation
resource.description: Profile for an observation in a batch-analysis report or a stability report

resource.name: Polymorphic Form
resource.description: Alternate structure present in the drug substance

resource.name: PqAddress
resource.description: pq-specific Constraints on the Address datatype dealing with US addresses.

resource.name: Quality Specification
resource.description: A quality specification is for a drug product or drug substance (excipient, API or raw material).

resource.name: Result Observation
resource.description: Profile for an observation in a batch-analysis report or a stability report

resource.name: Routine Drug Product
resource.description: Includes the identifying information of the drug product. Profile of Drug Product profile.

resource.name: Routine Drug Substance
resource.description: Provides sufficient information to identify a drug substance. Profile on Drug Substance profile.

resource.name: SponsorOrganization
resource.description: A profile for the data elements required to identify the sponsor of the drug products or substances.

resource.name: Stability Study
resource.description: Profile for the main stability study.

resource.name: Stability Study Interval Report
resource.description: Batch or lot stability testing to ensure that pharmaceutical products continue to meet the product specification or determine the expiry period.

resource.name: Stability Sub-Study
resource.description: Profile for the a stability sub-study.

resource.name: Drug Substance Container Closure
resource.description: Description and coding of the container closure system. Profile on Drug Substance profile.

resource.name: Aditional Information
resource.description: Any additional information

resource.name: Container Closure
resource.description:
The packaging information including a brief description of the components, the assembled
packaging system and any precautions needed to ensure the protection and preservation of the drug substance and drug product during their use in the clinical trials

resource.name: Content (%)
resource.description: The percentage of the component in the drug product.

resource.name: Drug Product Manufacturing Batch
resource.description: This profile defines the details of a batch of medicine.

resource.name: Drug Substance Manufacturing Batch
resource.description: This profile defines the details of a batch of API.

resource.name: Interpretation Code
resource.description: A code that describes how to relate the given value to an acceptance value.

resource.name: Product Batch Ingredient Extension
resource.description: Extension for measurement properties for ingredients in the batch formla..

resource.name: Study Protocol
resource.description: Study protocol identification

resource.name: Pull Date
resource.description: Contains elements related to the pull date of the study samples in a stability study.

resource.name: Study Interval
resource.description: Contains elements related to the intervals of the stability study.

resource.name: Quality Specification Reference
resource.description: The product specification used in the batch release or stability testing.

resource.name: Batch Size
resource.description: The quantity made by the batch formula.

resource.name: Relative Retention Time
resource.description:
The ratio of the retention time of a component relative to that of another used as a reference obtained under identical conditions as an alias for the name of the unidentified impurities. [Source: Adapted from USP]
Example: 1:23 (a ratio)
Note: This is the title or name of the impurity (sometimes expressed as a ratio) and not the value

resource.name: Replicate Number
resource.description: An identification number for a member of the set of results for a test, usually the sequence order in which the test was executed. Individual tests are executed on multiple samples to give greater validity to the findings. [Source SME Defined] Examples: Prepare six aliquots from the sample. Test 8 samples. If any fall above 110%, test an additional 7 samples. Record all replicate values as stated in the method.

resource.name: Specification Status
resource.description:
The current FDA regulatory status of the specification. [Source: SME Defined]
Examples: Approved, Not Approved, etc.
Note: There are instances when FDA does approve the Specifications in a supplement or an amendment where other information in the dossier has not changed.

resource.name: Specification Type
resource.description:
A classification of specification related to the kind of the entity it is referencing. [Source: SME Defined]
Examples: Drug product, drug substance, etc.

resource.name: Strength Operator
resource.description: A mathematical symbol that denotes equality or inequality between two values.

resource.name: Strength Type (for API)
resource.description: A physical (content) of activity measurement of the strength of the active ingredint..

resource.name: Test Method Origin
resource.description: A coded value specifying the source of the method. [Source: SME Defined] Example: Compendial

resource.name: Test Order | Stage Sequence Order
resource.description:
Test Order: The sequential number assigned to each Test to specify the order of display on the Quality Specification. [Source: SME Defined]
Stage Sequence Order: The order of the stages in regular succession. [Source: SME Defined]
Examples: 1, 2, 3.

resource.name: eCTD sections Value Set
resource.description: Value set of all codes in Code system PQCMC Comp Section Types for bindings that require a valueset instead of the code systme.

resource.name: EVMPD Substance Classification
resource.description: EudraVigilance eXtended Medicinal Product Dictionary (XEVMPD) substance classes

resource.name: GENC Country Codes
resource.description: The GENC Standard specifies an information model for representing names and codes of geopolitical entities and administrative subdivisions, with supporting information. A geopolitical entity is a region controlled by a political community having an organized government and possessing internal and external sovereignty, most often as a State but sometimes having a dependent relationship on another political authority, or a special sovereignty status. Geopolitical entities may be divided into administratively subordinate divisions. A GENC code (or, synonymously, an ISO 3166 code element) for a geopolitical entity or administrative subdivision is a unique designation of that concept within a set of similar concepts established by a suitable authority. This information model is based on that of ISO 3166 but extended to capture additional information required by U.S. Government stakeholders.

resource.name: ActionRelationTypes
resource.description: subset of http://hl7.org/fhir/action-relationship-type used for quality specification stage relationshps

resource.name: Batch utilization Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to batch utilization in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Chemical Structure Data File Type Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to chemical structure data file types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to closure types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to conformance to criteria in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to container orientation in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to container types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to numeric interpretation codes in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Interval Description Code Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to interval description codes in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Impurity classification Category Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to process related impurity categories in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Quality Standard Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to quality benchmarks in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to retest date classification functions in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to source types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Specification Status Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to specification statuses in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Specification Type Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to specification types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Sponsor Identifier Type Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to sponsor identifier types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Stability Study Reason Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to stability study reason data in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Storage Conditions Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to storage conditions in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Strength Operator Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to strength operators in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Strength Type Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to strength types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Study Type Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to study types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Test Category Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to test categories in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Test Method Origin Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to test method origins in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Test Usage Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to test usage in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.description: Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to testing site unique identifier types in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.

resource.name: Units Of Measure Terminology
resource.description:
Terminology used to qualify the information pertaining to units of measure in the framework of the Pharmaceutical Quality/Chemistry, Manufacturing and Controls documents.
Note: Inlcudes SPL Unit of Presentation Terminology

resource.name: Drug Route Of Administration Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used for representation of the information on pharmaceutical product route of administration in the framework of the Structured Product Labeling documents.

resource.name: Pharmaceutical Dosage Form Terminology
resource.description: Terminology used for representation of the information on pharmaceutical product dosage form in the framework of the SPL documents.
